resources.string: Please insert the following pin code:

Hello and Welcome to our testing application!

Thanks for helping us making the product greater!

Here is what we need from you to make it play:


Step 1: 
Enter the first PIN code twice using 2 keyboards for 10 times.


Step 2: 
Enter the second PIN code twice using 2 keyboards for 10 times.


Each time you complete a pair you will be shown the statistic page for reference.


Output at the end of the test:


You are Awesome! You just improved our accuracy!


Thank you so much!
